code: export var sortCoins=function sortCoins(sortName,coins){var array=coins.slice();console.log(sortName);switch(sortName){case'Name':case'Name down':return array.sort(function(a,b){var nameA=a.name.toUpperCase();var nameB=b.name.toUpperCase();if(nameA<nameB){return-1;}if(nameA>nameB){return 1;}return 0;});case'Name up':return array.sort(function(a,b){var nameA=a.name.toUpperCase();var nameB=b.name.toUpperCase();if(nameB<nameA){return-1;}if(nameB>nameA){return 1;}return 0;});case'Price':case'Price down':return array.sort(function(a,b){return a.priceUsd-b.priceUsd;});case'Price up':return array.sort(function(a,b){return b.priceUsd-a.priceUsd;});case'Rank':case'Rank down':return array.sort(function(a,b){return b.rank-a.rank;});case'Rank up':return[];case'MarketCap':case'MarketCap down':return array.sort(function(a,b){return a.marketCapUsd-b.marketCapUsd;});case'MarketCap up':return array.sort(function(a,b){return b.marketCapUsd-a.marketCapUsd;});case'wap (24Hr)':case'wap (24Hr) down':return array.sort(function(a,b){return a.vwap24Hr-b.vwap24Hr;});case'wap (24Hr) up':return array.sort(function(a,b){return b.vwap24Hr-a.vwap24Hr;});case'Supply':case'Supply down':return array.sort(function(a,b){return a.supply-b.supply;});case'Supply up':return array.sort(function(a,b){return b.supply-a.supply;});case'Volume (24Hr)':case'Volume (24Hr) down':return array.sort(function(a,b){return a.volumeUsd24Hr-b.volumeUsd24Hr;});case'Volume (24Hr) up':return array.sort(function(a,b){return b.volumeUsd24Hr-a.volumeUsd24Hr;});case'Change (24Hr)':case'Change (24Hr) down':return array.sort(function(a,b){return a.changePercent24Hr-b.changePercent24Hr;});case'Change (24Hr) up':return array.sort(function(a,b){return b.changePercent24Hr-a.changePercent24Hr;});default:return'';}};
